page.title: 12FARMING Land-use
page.content:
{Land-Use
The land-use in the area is almost exclusively arable in character with the main crops being cereals,potatoes,sugar beet,peas and oil seed rape. Due to the high quality of the land up to three crops of vegetables a year may be harvested. Although very limited some intensive animal rearing does take place particularly chickens and pigs.Irrigation is widely used where potatoes are grown and many farmers have constructed water storage reservoirs.During the construction of the by-pass supplies of the blue lias clay were required and the subsequent depressions were used as reservoirs.
